Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 1-2012. An 82-year-old 
man with persistent ulcers on the hands.
Kroshinsky D(1), Hoang MP, Hasserjian RP.

Author information:
(1)Department of Dermatology, Massachusetts General Hospital, and Harvard 
Medical School, Boston, USA.

Comment in
